events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated for several days, and I am really concerned about the delay.
The issue was identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's report of an order that has not arrived and stalled tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to delivery support specialist Jordan to assist with the delayed shipment.
Hello! I'm Jordan from the delivery team. I'm here to help you with the delay you're experiencing with your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have received so far? This will help me investigate the issue further.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The last status update was ‘In transit’ from the local hub three days ago, but nothing since then.
Thank you for the details. I’ve contacted the courier and expedited the tracking update. We expect a delivery within the next 48 hours. I will follow up with you shortly.
Thanks for your quick help. I appreciate the update and look forward to receiving the package soon.
Your shipment was delivered successfully today. Please let us know if there are any further concerns with your order.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your package and that everything is satisfactory with your order.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience throughout the process.
